entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression - Allocation/WorkingSet on PlaintextPlatform #79774
  • WriteEntry_LongFileSize tests failing in CI #79773
  • Binding a dictionary mutates existing values instead of replacing #79770
  • [API Proposal]: Add IsEmpty property to collections and arrays. #79769
  • ConfigurationBinder doesn't honor pre-existing ISet when binding #79766
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer proposal: Remove unused resources #79765
  • Ensure that JIT and other IL compilers preserve order of data dependent memory accesses #79764
  • Improve Enum function performance (TryParse, ToString, Parse, etc...) #79762
  • `Environment.GetFolderPath(ApplicationData)` returns empty string on linux under root account #79757
  • System.Collections.Immutable version 7.0.0 warns about not supporting .net 7.0 #79756
  • [API Proposal]: Provide path information for custom JsonException error messages in System.Text.Json #79755
    Future
  • issues of milestone 8.0.0 already fixed/present in 7.0.1 #79752
  • JIT: invalid flags handling by fgMorphStoreDynBlock #79750
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments failing in CI (Outerloop) #79749
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] EFIGS shard lacks currencies that it should serve #79740
    8.0.0
  • TaskWebClientTest.UploadValues_Success test is failing #79731
    8.0.0
  • HTTP/3 checker website claims it supports HTTP/3, but HttpClient throws VER_NEG_ERROR #79729
  • [Weird] HTTP/3 does not work after publishing app, but works on debug and release #79727
  • Expose System.Linq.Expressions.CanCompileToIL feature switch #79726

Closed

  • Test failure: ConvertScalarToVector128UInt32UInt32 #79558
    8.0.0
  • Upgrading from netcore3.1 to net6.0 breaks relative path support in SQLCommand #70989
    Future
  • Dogfooding instructions for .NET 8 NativeAOT on macOS x64 via Rosetta #79253
    8.0.0
  • SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose failed with ObjectDisposedException #75354
    8.0.0
  • Document the memory model guaranteed by dotnet/runtime runtimes #63474
    Future
  • Unused resources analyzer #79745
  • [browser][tests] Potential memory leak of cached Completion Task #46566
    Future
  • Inconsistent generation on a timestamp value using DateTimeOffset #79743
  • [mono] Implement GC.TryStartNoGCRegion, GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification and GCSettings.LatencyMode #79758
    Future
  • Verify limitation in Compiler::impCanPInvokeInlineCallSite still applies #330
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Implicit operators for Task<T> #79746
  • SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated returns wrong value when cached creds are used #65563
    8.0.0
  • Span bounds checking not fully eliminated in some cases when index is constant and length is known #1115
    Future
  • RyuJIT properly optimizes structs with a single field if the field type is int but not if it is double #4323
    Future
  • Perf work around System V classification implementation. #4576
    Future
  • Make LINQ providers (Queryable) compatible with NativeAOT #79199
    8.0.0
  • Fix or delete tests that make invalid assumptions (about codegen or anything else) #5888
    Future
  • Floating point benchmark performance difference Linux vs. Windows #6058
    Future
  • JIT: remove redundant load-after-store bounds-checks #6514
    Future
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() on Android leads to FileNotFoundException #77441
  • Remove FEATURE_COMPILE define constant from System.Linq.Expressions #32878
    Future
  • Blazor Web Assembly (.NET 7 RC2) - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect, again #77013
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable AD0001 #79767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable a few outerloop tests and update issue numbers #79759
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix indir flags propagation for a couple of cases #79751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix switch peeling flags propagation #79748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up some old style walks and QMARK validation #79747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Delete some commented tests #79742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #79558 #79681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix failing coreclr tests in `runincontext` mode #79705
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Change the default for ilc compiler architecture #79761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • improve SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose test #79718
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • disable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws #79730
    area-System.Net.Security, disabled-test
  • add EventSource log to alpn on macOS #79737
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.0
  • Memory model document. #75790
    documentation, area-Meta, memory model
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve spmi diffs summary report #79725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Avoid touching `NameMangler` during scanning #79738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Allow passing vtypes with a single scalar field to nat… #79686
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #79601
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79667
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Look up Queryable operator MethodInfos without MakeGenericMethod #79717
    area-System.Linq
  • Avoid hydrating type system entities for all of CoreLib #79732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve SIMD vector equality operator #79719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Skip nested types in `EcmaModule.GetType` #79734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not run recursive cycle detection on debug builds #79735
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make MethodDesc.IsStaticConstructor more efficient #79733
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • MacOS Ventura createdump fix - Part II #79728
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Support `x % {pow2_cns}` transformation for `ulong` types #79676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Dynamic generate hwintrinsic tests #79552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79703
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
